attributes.action: get rid of the royal falily
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we dont need the royal family to run this country, what are they there for? they dont seem to do anything for the public get shot of them once and for all, a lot of public cash is spent on them and they dont give us anything back,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
